quote: Concentration can be cultivayed. One can learn to exercise will power, discipline one's body and train one's mind

author: Aesop

quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there's love and inspiration, i don't think you can go wrong

quote: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you ca with it, and make it the life you want to live

quote: Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world
author: Harrit Tubman

quote: If you feel like there's something out there that you're supposed to be doing, if you have a passio for it, the stop wishing and just do it

quote: If you don't love what you do, you won't do it with much covictio or passion
author: Mia Hamm

quote: Far ad away the best prize that life offers is the chance to work hard at work worth doing
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: There is no passion to be found playing small inn settlig for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The one thing that you have that nobody else has is you. Your voice, your mind, your story, your vision. So write and draw and build and play and dance and live as only you can
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live
author: Mae Jemison

quote: Follow your own passion-not your parents', not your teachers'-yours
author: UnKnown

quote: Passion is the genesis of genius
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: Dreams are excursions into the limbo of things, a semi-deliverance from the human prison
author: Henrl Amiei

quote: That which the dream shows is the shadow of such wisdom as exists in man, even if during his waking state he may know it because we are fooling away our time with outward and perishing things, and are asleep in regard to that which is real within ourself
author: Paracelsus

quote: Keep your heart open to dreams. For as long as there's a dream, there is hope, and as long as there is hope, there is joy in living
author: Unknown Author

quote: Man, alone, has the power to transform his thoughts into physical reality; ma, aloe, ca dream ad make his dreams come true
author: Napoleo Hill

quote: When you stop havig dreams and ideals--well, you might as well stop altogether
author: Marian Anderson

quote: Be careful what you water your dreams with. Water them with worry and fear and you will produce weeds that choke the life from your dream. Water them with optimism and solutions and you will cultivate success. Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a prolem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to urture your dream
author: Lao Tzu

quote: You've got to follow your passion. You've got to figure out what it is you love, who you really are. And have the courage to do that. I believe that the only courage anybbody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Often we don't even realize who we're meant to be because we're so busy trying to live out someone else's ideas. But other people and their opinions hold no power in defining our destiny
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Dream lofty dreams, and as you dream, so you shall become. Your vision is the promise of what you shall one day be; your ideal is the prophecy of what you shall at last unveil
author: James Allen

quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions
author: Edgar Cayce

quote: Fellow your dreams, they know the way
author: Kobe Yamada

quote: It may be that those who do most, dream most
author: Stephen Butter Leacock

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men
author: Goethe

quote: Dreaming permits each and every one of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of our lives
author: William Dement

quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other
author: John Fitzgerald

quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stop
author: Henry Adams

quote: You don't lead by pointinng and telling people some place to go. You lead by going and making a case
author: Ken Kesey

quote: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd
author: Max Lucado

quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself, or to get all the credit for doing it
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish
author: Sam Walton

quote: Success is no accident. it is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most to all, love of what you are doing or learnning to do
author: Pele

quote: Without pain, without sacrifice, we would have nothing
author: Fight Club

quote: There are still many causes worth sacrificing for, so much history yet to be made
author: Anonymous

quote: Don't be afraid to give yourself everything you've ever wanted in life
author: Anonymous

quote: Most of you don't want success as much as you want to sleep
author: Eric Thomas

quote: Are you ready to sacrifice who you are, for what you will become
author: Eric Thomas

quote: The ultimate test of man's conscience may be his willingness to sacrifice something today for future generations whose words of thanks will not be heard
author: Gaylord Nelson

quote: Sometimes we have to step down to help somebody up, not because we failed to go up, but as a humble sacrifice to save a great soul
author: Terry Mark

quote: As soon as sacrifice becomes a duty and necessity to mankind. I see no limit to the horizon which opens before him
author: Ernest Renan

quote: Sacrifice still exists everywhere the elect of each generation suffers for the salvation of the rest
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: What was do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal
author: Albert Pine

quote: Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier
author: Zahid Abas

quote: All great things worth having require great sacrifice worth giving
author: Paullina Simons

quote: One day, you'll be just a memory for some people. Do your best to be a good one
author: Anonymous

quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger & better
author: Anonymous

quote: Any fool can criticize, complain, condemn, and most fools do
author: Anonymous

quote: Innovation is anything, but business as usual
author: Anonymous

quote: Fear can keep us up all night long, but faith makes one fine pillow
author: Anonymous

quote: Nothing is an obstacle unless you say it is
author: Wally Amos

quote: We are continually faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems
author: John W. Gardner

quote: It's not enough to be busy, so are the ants. The question is, what are we busy about?
author: Henry David

quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself
author: Andy Warhol

quote: I see God everywhere
author: Jean Favre

quote: A year from now you may wish you had strated today
author: Karen Lamb

quote: The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rationalm mind is a faithful servant. We have created society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift
author: Albert Elinstein

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Minds are like parachutes, they work best when open
author: T.Dewar

quote: With every rising of sun, think of your life as just begun
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: If you would be wealthy think of saving as well as getting
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: If you always do what you always did, you will always get what you always got
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Innovation is not the result of chance, it's the result of action. It's not a thing to wait for. It's a thing to do
author: Phil Mckinney

quote: There are no old roads to new directions
author: The Boston Consulting Group

quote: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: While we are postponing, life speeds by
author: Seneca

quote: If you want something new, you have to stop doing something old
author: Peter F. Drucker

quote: Your vision will become clear when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside awakens
author: Carl Jung

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it
author: Alan Kay

quote: A discovery is said to be an accident meeting a prepared mind
author: A. von Szent-Gyorgyi

quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and i took the one less travelled by and that has made all the difference
author: Robert Frost

quote: Remember the two benefits of failure. First, if you do fail, you learn what doesn't work; and second, the failure gives you the opportunity to try a new approach
author: Roger Von Oech

quote: It isn't all over; everything has not been invented; the human adventure is just begining
author: Gene Rodden berry

quote: In a world of change, the learners shall inherit the earth, while the learned shall find themselves perfectly suited for a world that no longer exists
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Do not get obsolete like an old technology, keep innovating yourself
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: A mere friend will agree with you, but a real friend will argue
author: Russian Proverb

quote: It isn't what you do, but how you do it
author: John Wooden

quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention
author: John Burroughs

quote: The more we belong to God the more we spin in control
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: Sharing can change the world
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: Show God's love in a tangible way
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: Accountability and responsibility: two words that can describe your present and future
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: A mature individual doesn't wait to be given responsibility, he takes it
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: The superior man blames himself. The inferior man blames others
author: Don Shula

quote: Love is more about being the right person than finding the right person
author: Barbara Bartlein

quote: Aerodynamically the bumblebee shouldn't be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn't know that so it goes on flying anyway
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Minds are like parachutes - they only function when open
author: Thomas Dewar

quote: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer
author: Rick Pitino

quote: When I quote others I do so in order to express my own ideas more clearly
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off the goal
author: Henry Ford

quote: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort
author: John Ruskin

quote: My interest is in the future because I am going to spend the rest of my life there
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Luck is where preparation meets opportunity
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Do just once what others say you can't do, and you will never pay attention to their limitations again
author: James R. Cook

quote: If we are together nothing is impossible. If we are divided all will fail
author: Winston Churchill

quote: To lead the people, work behind them
author: Lao Tzu

quote: What we have learned from others becomes our own reflection
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A leader has the vision and conviction that a dream can be achieved. He inspires the power and energy to get it done
author: Ralph Lauren

quote: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Do not go where the path may lead; go instead where there is no path and leave a trail
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The ability to honestly and quietly reflect on one's life is one of the most powerful tools for personal growth
author: Richard Carlson

quote: By being yourself, you put something wonderful in the world that was not there before
author: Edwin Elliot

quote: It isn't what you do, but how you do it
author: John Wooden

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Silence is a source of great strength
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else
author: Les Brown

quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle
author: Plato

quote: A great man shows his greatness by the way he treats little men
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Your attitude is either the lock on, or the key to the door of success
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Ask not what your country can do for you - ask what you can do for your country
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit
author: Harry S Truman

quote: Ability can take you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It’s not about what you do but how you do what you do
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: A superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions
author: Confucius

quote: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: We are all born originals - why is it so many of us die copies
author: Edward Young

quote: The more elaborate our means of communication, the less we communicate
author: Joseph Priestley

quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The greatest compliment that was ever paid me was when someone asked me what I thought, and attended to my answer
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The level of what you can let go of will determine what you will receive
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: Sometimes you don’t have to carry the weight of the world on your shoulders. Reach out for help
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: Our true state of mind is joy; share the greatest gift of love to receive more joy
author: Charles Obiukwu

quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Open your arms to change, but don't let go of your values
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Better to keep your mouth shut and appear stupid than to open it and remove all doubt
author: Mark Twain

quote: Well done is better than well said
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Our attitude towards others determines their attitude towards us
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with
author: Mark Twain

quote: Create your future from your future, not from your past
author: Werner Erhard

quote: If you are working on something exciting that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you
author: Steve Jobs
